title: Insufficient IP/RP Bug (New Client)
body: So today I saved up enough IP to purchase Fiora (4800 IP), but in the shop it says insufficient ip/rp although I have 4801 IP. I am not sure what the issue is but I really wanted to play a game as her today.

replies.body:
This might be a sync issue if you're on the updated client.  Hop back on to the legacy to get your accurate balance:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Enjoy the great duelist!
I'm having the same issue with Camille. I have over 7900 IP and yet it won't let me buy the champ with IP.
